thread.title: SPM Communications And Austin Footwear Labs: A Perfect Pair
thread.title_full: SPM Communications And Austin Footwear Labs: A Perfect Pair - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: SPM Communications And Austin Footwear Labs: A Perfect Pair
text:
SPM Communications
Texas PR firm is agency of record for new high-tech, eco-friendly shoe company
DALLAS , Oct. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- SPM Communications has been named PR agency of record for Austin Footwear Labs, a new shoe company that upcycles scrap tires into high-quality sandals and other products. The agency will serve the account from its Austin office, which opens Nov. 2 .
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151021/279286LOGO
SPM will help the Austin, Texas -based company introduce its stylish, durable, comfortable sandals, made with 50 percent APX ® upcycled tire rubber. It also will help share AFL's earth-saving mission to reduce the number of used tires going into landfills or being burned and emitting toxins into the air.
"Austin Footwear Labs was born from a desire to prove that you do not have to compromise quality and fashion when you choose eco-friendly footwear and apparel," said Austin Footwear Labs President Fitz Lee. "Partnering with SPM is an important step in getting the word out about Austin Footwear Labs' earth-saving mission and cutting-edge technology that turns tires into high-quality sandals and other products."
The Austin -born brand launched in summer 2015 and currently sells its shoes online at www.austinfootwearlabs.com . It is the first footwear company that incorporates APX ® upcycled tire rubber into its high-quality, sustainable shoes.
"We seek out clients who do well by doing good, and we believe in Austin Footwear Labs' mission and product," said SPM founder and President Suzanne Miller . "Customers increasingly expect more from the brands they choose. We will help AFL educate media and consumers about how the company is breaking technological barriers and taking green to a new level."
About SPM Communications
Founded in 1999, Dallas -based SPM Communications is ranked the sixth-largest independent PR firm in Texas by O'Dwyer's , and is expanding with the opening of its Austin office Nov. 1, 2015 . SPM represents national and regional restaurant, food, retail and lifestyle brands , and has been featured in The Wall Street Journal for its "No Jerks" policy of mutual respect and trust among clients, team members and company leaders. More information is available at www.spmcommunications.com , www.facebook.com/spmcommunications and on Twitter and Instagram @spmcomm.
MEDIA CONTACT
Kristen Kauffman
214-379-7000
kristen@spmcommunications.com
